ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.Off.outerStatePort.subgraphStatePort.activeSteps
ScalarVariable.description: Number of active steps in the CompositeStep

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.OffToOn.t
ScalarVariable.description: = actual waiting time (transition will fire when t > waitTime)

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.OffToOn.t_start
ScalarVariable.description: Time instant at which the transition would fire, if waitTime would be zero

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.On.outerStatePort.subgraphStatePort.activeSteps
ScalarVariable.description: Number of active steps in the CompositeStep

ScalarVariable.description: = actual waiting time (transition will fire when t > waitTime)

ScalarVariable.description: Number of active steps in the CompositeStep

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.stateGraphRoot.subgraphStatePort.activeStepsDummy
ScalarVariable.description: Dummy variable in order that connector fulfills restriction of connector

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.OffToOn.waitTime
ScalarVariable.description: Wait time before transition fires

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.OnToOff.waitTime
ScalarVariable.description: Wait time before transition fires

ScalarVariable.description: Wait time before transition fires

ScalarVariable.description: Wait time before transition fires

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.stateGraphRoot.activeSteps
ScalarVariable.description: Number of active steps within the stategraph

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.Off.nIn
ScalarVariable.description: Number of input connections

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.Off.nOut
ScalarVariable.description: Number of output connections

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.On.nIn
ScalarVariable.description: Number of input connections

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.On.nOut
ScalarVariable.description: Number of output connections

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.Red.nIn
ScalarVariable.description: Number of input connections

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.Red.nOut
ScalarVariable.description: Number of output connections

ScalarVariable.name: _D_whenCondition1
ScalarVariable.description: tic.Sensor1_Active and not pre(tic.Sensor1_Active)

ScalarVariable.name: _D_whenCondition10
ScalarVariable.description: car1.speed <= 0.0

ScalarVariable.name: _D_whenCondition11
ScalarVariable.description: car2.speed >= car2.maxSpeed

ScalarVariable.name: _D_whenCondition12
ScalarVariable.description: car2.distance + car2.BreakingDistance + 5.0 >= trainlight.Intersection and car2.distance + car2.BreakingDistance - 5.0 <= trainlight.Intersection and car2.speed > 0.0 and car2.state == TrainCrossing.TrainLightColor.red

ScalarVariable.name: _D_whenCondition13
ScalarVariable.description: car2.distance < trainlight.Intersection and car2.state == TrainCrossing.TrainLightColor.on and trainlight.Gate_Angle >= 90.0 and car2.speed < car2.maxSpeed

ScalarVariable.name: _D_whenCondition14
ScalarVariable.description: car2.speed <= 0.0

ScalarVariable.name: _D_whenCondition15
ScalarVariable.description: car2.distance - car2.Length <= trainlight.Intersection and car2.distance >= trainlight.Intersection

ScalarVariable.name: _D_whenCondition17
ScalarVariable.description: trainlight.Gate_Angle <= 0.0

ScalarVariable.name: _D_whenCondition18
ScalarVariable.description: trainlight.On.active or trainlight.Off.active

ScalarVariable.name: _D_whenCondition19
ScalarVariable.description: trainlight.Gate_Angle >= 90.0

ScalarVariable.name: _D_whenCondition2
ScalarVariable.description: tic.Sensor2_Active <> pre(tic.Sensor2_Active) and not tic.Sensor2_Active and pre(tic.Sensor2_Active)

ScalarVariable.name: _D_whenCondition3
ScalarVariable.description: car.speed >= car.maxSpeed

ScalarVariable.name: _D_whenCondition4
ScalarVariable.description: car.distance + car.BreakingDistance + 5.0 >= trainlight.Intersection and car.distance + car.BreakingDistance - 5.0 <= trainlight.Intersection and car.speed > 0.0 and car.state == TrainCrossing.TrainLightColor.red

ScalarVariable.name: _D_whenCondition5
ScalarVariable.description: car.distance < trainlight.Intersection and car.state == TrainCrossing.TrainLightColor.on and trainlight.Gate_Angle >= 90.0 and car.speed < car.maxSpeed

ScalarVariable.name: _D_whenCondition6
ScalarVariable.description: car.speed <= 0.0

ScalarVariable.name: _D_whenCondition7
ScalarVariable.description: car1.speed >= car1.maxSpeed

ScalarVariable.name: _D_whenCondition8
ScalarVariable.description: car1.distance + car1.BreakingDistance + 5.0 >= trainlight.Intersection and car1.distance + car1.BreakingDistance - 5.0 <= trainlight.Intersection and car1.speed > 0.0 and car1.state == TrainCrossing.TrainLightColor.red

ScalarVariable.name: _D_whenCondition9
ScalarVariable.description: car1.distance < trainlight.Intersection and car1.state == TrainCrossing.TrainLightColor.on and trainlight.Gate_Angle >= 90.0 and car1.speed < car1.maxSpeed

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.Off.active
ScalarVariable.description: = true if step is active, otherwise the step is not active

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.Off.inPort[2].occupied
ScalarVariable.description: true, if step is active

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.Off.localActive
ScalarVariable.description: = true if step is active, otherwise the step is not active

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.Off.newActive
ScalarVariable.description: Value of active in the next iteration

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.Off.oldActive
ScalarVariable.description: Value of active when CompositeStep was aborted

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.OffToOn.enableFire
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if all firing conditions are true

ScalarVariable.description: = true if step is active, otherwise the step is not active

ScalarVariable.description: true, if step is active

ScalarVariable.description: Value of active when CompositeStep was aborted

ScalarVariable.description: true, if step is active

ScalarVariable.description: = true, if all firing conditions are true

ScalarVariable.description: = true, if transition may fire (time varying expression)

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.RedToOn.enableFire
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if all firing conditions are true

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.OffToOn.enableTimer
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if timer is enabled

ScalarVariable.description: = true, if timer is enabled

ScalarVariable.description: true, if step is active

ScalarVariable.description: true, if transition fires and step is activated

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.Off.inPort[2].set
ScalarVariable.description: true, if transition fires and step is activated

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.Off.outPort[1].reset
ScalarVariable.description: true, if transition fires and step is deactivated

ScalarVariable.description: = true, if resume transition of CompositeStep fires

ScalarVariable.description: = true, if suspend transition of CompositeStep fires

ScalarVariable.description: = true, if transition may fire (time varying expression)

ScalarVariable.description: = true, if transition fires

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.OffToOn.inPort.reset
ScalarVariable.description: true, if transition fires and the step connected to the transition input is deactivated

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.OffToOn.localCondition
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if transition may fire

ScalarVariable.description: true, if step connected to the transition output is active

ScalarVariable.name: trainlight.OffToOn.outPort.set
ScalarVariable.description: true, if transition fires and step connected to the transition output becomes active
